General.Name: Gabriel India Limited
General.Description: Gabriel India Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of ride control products to the automotive industry in India. The company offers air spring suspension shock absorbers, axle and cabin dampers, canister shock absorbers, dampers for diesel locomotives and Linke Hofmann busch coaches, double-acting hydraulic shock absorbers, e-assist adjustable damping front forks and shock absorbers, front forks, mono shox, rear shock absorbers, seat dampers, and strut assemblies. It also markets radiator coolants, suspension bush kits, front fork oils, gas springs, and wheel rims under the Gabriel brand name. The company's products are used in two and three wheelers, passenger cars, commercial vehicles, railways, off highway, and aftermarkets applications. It provides its products through agents, dealers, and retailers; and exports worldwide. The company was incorporated in 1961 and is headquartered in Pune, India. Gabriel India Limited is a subsidiary of Asia Investments Private Limited.
